testsuite.name: com.example.testingweb.WebLayerTest

testcase.name: shouldReturnDefaultMessage()

failure.message: java.lang.AssertionError: Response content Expected: a string containing "Hello, World" but: was "Finaliza el curso DevOps Foundation V4 - Tomas Castro"
